alert.note: Alert for Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 28 at 3:24AM PST until December 29 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 30 to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...The southern end of the Rogue Valley, including Ashland, Talent, and Phoenix, plus I-5, and the surrounding high terrain in the SE corner of Jackson County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. High profile vehicles may have difficulty driving. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There could be a lull in the gusty winds between 6 AM and 10 AM PST before picking back up again in the afternoon. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
